go_data.term: negative regulation of NF-kappaB transcription factor activity
go_data.justification: A20 inhibits the activation of NF-kappaB induced by IL-1R as well as by TNFRs.

go_data.term: cellular response to tumor necrosis factor
go_data.justification: The A20 zinc finger protein protects cells from tumor necrosis factor cytotoxicity.
Manganese superoxide dismutase or A20 induced by NF-kappaB activation will also contribute to the survival of cells during cell proliferation/growth.
